DOC.brief_summary: Robotic approach to sacral colpopexy is a relatively new procedure. The literature is scarce in regard to long term outcomes. This advanced procedure is offered at Morristown Memorial. THis protocol will review the one year outcome of patients who underwent this pocedure using a polypropylene mesh. These outcomes will incude anatomical and quality of life measures.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Robotic Assisted Laparoscopic Sacral Colpopexy Using Alyte Mesh
DOC.criteria: Any patient receiving Robotic assisted laparoscopic sacral copopexy with polypropylene mesh >21 y.o Graft material other than polypropylene mesh Enrollment in another study
